LoyaltyProgramBadge.name: LoyaltyProgramBadge
LoyaltyProgramBadge.description: Represents information about the badge that's associated with a loyalty program.

Description.description: The description of the loyalty program badge.

ImageUrl.description: The URL of the image location for the loyalty program badge.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LoyaltyProgramId.description: The loyalty program that's associated with the badge.

Name.description: The name of the loyalty program badge.

StartDate.description: Required. The date from when the loyalty program badge can be assigned to members.

Status.description: Required. Specifies the status of the loyalty program badge.

ValidityDuration.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the validity period.

ValidityDurationUnit.description: The number of days or months in the validity period.

ValidityEndDate.description: The date after which the badge is no longer assigned to members. Select a value for this field if the badge's validity type is FixedDate.

ValidityType.description: Required. Specifies the model used to determine the deration for which the badge is valid for a member.
